title: How to Like, Comment or Share on TikTok

steps.title: Find the video you want to like.
steps.content: Find the video you want to like. You can scroll through your feed, search for a hashtag, choose a sound, etc.

steps.title: Tap the heart.
steps.content: Tap the heart. Alternatively, double-tap. The heart will turn from white to red, the like count should increase, and the video should be added to your liked videos.

steps.title: Log in if necessary.
steps.content: Log in if necessary. You need to log in to like videos. Once you log in, the video will be liked.

steps.title: Find the video you want to comment on.
steps.content: Find the video you want to comment on. You can scroll through your feed, search for a hashtag, choose a sound, etc.

steps.title: Tap the comments button.
steps.content: Tap the comments button. Alternatively, tap "Say something nice...". Write your comment, and tap "Send".

steps.title: Like a comment.
steps.content: Like a comment. Tap the comments button, then tap the heart of the comment you like. The heart will turn from gray to red and the like count should increase.

steps.title: Log in if necessary.
steps.content: Log in if necessary. You need to log in to comment on videos. Once you log in, the video will be liked.

steps.title: Find the video you want to share.
steps.content: Find the video you want to share. You can scroll through your feed, search for a hashtag, choose a sound, etc.

steps.title: Tap on the triple dots (if the video is your own video) or the arrow.
steps.content: Tap on the triple dots (if the video is your own video) or the arrow. Choose how you want to share your video.

steps.title: Log in if necessary.
steps.content: Log in if necessary. If you are adding a video or sound or hashtag to your favorites list, or dueting a video, you will need to log in. Once you log in, the action will complete.
